Package com.mySTARS.Entities

Class Course

java.lang.Object
com.mySTARS.Entities.Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Course class holds the methods that handle implementation of code related to the courses

  • Constructor Details

    • Course

      public Course​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, int courseUnits, SCHOOL schoolName, java.util.ArrayList<IndexDetail> indexesInfo)
      Constructor for making a course. Takes in the basic details of a course and returns a valid Course object
      Parameters:
      courseCode - courseCode that is uniquely tied to a particular course
      courseName - Name of a course
      courseUnits - Number of academic units of a course
      schoolName - Name of the school that the course is under
      indexesInfo - Array list holding all the information related to the indexes

    • addNewIndexDetail

      public void addNewIndexDetail​(int index, int capacity)
      Method to add a new index to a course
      Parameters:
      index - Refers to a specific index number
      capacity - Refers to the capacity of that index number, meaning the number of students that that index number can hold

    • makeEmptyCourse

      public static Course makeEmptyCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, int courseUnits, SCHOOL schoolName)
      Method to create an empty course to input details of new course that admin wishes to create
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code that is tagged to each course
      courseName - Name of course
      courseUnits - Number of academic units that course has
      schoolName - Name of school that course is under
      Returns:
      Returns the empty course

    • makeCourse

      public static Course makeCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode, java.lang.String courseName, int courseUnits, SCHOOL schoolName, java.util.ArrayList<IndexDetail> indexesDetails)
      Method to make that course, using empty course created above
      Parameters:
      courseCode - Course code that is tagged to each course
      courseName - Name of course
      courseUnits - Number of academic units that course has
      schoolName - Name of school that course is under
      indexesDetails - Details of indexes under a particular course
      Returns:
      Returns the new course that has been created
